attributes.review: I had waited a MONTH for this app to download, and when it did i opened it and i see Addison Rae stuck in a laundry machine home alone with lil huddy, it was a VERY disturbing to see what happened next. After all the time it took to download the app it ended with a hype house version of stepbrothers. I would like my time back!
attributes.title: DO NOT GET

attributes.review: When I got this app I didn’t want to get it. They forced me to press the app with their cold, slimy hands. They asked me “ what’s your phone number?” And I said “ EW NO YOU AGUSTUS GLOOP!” And that’s when the turn tables have. It all came crashing down so the next time you want to download this, get ready to meet your greatest fear.💅
attributes.title: ✨no thanks✨

attributes.review:
IF YOU SUPPORT TRUMP DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP!! 
it taps right into your phone so the government can listen to your conversations!! 
as soon as i opened the app, it crashed, my entire phone shut down and when i opened it back up, my phone had been hacked. i had to get a whole new one. 
DO!! NOT!! DOWNLOAD!! 
i urge the app store to remove such a harmful app.
attributes.title: AWFUL

attributes.review: When I was playing this app I realized how terrible of quality it was. I then tripped and fell into a whole filled with bacon grease and a little bit got into my mouth. Then a pack of wild dogs almost wolves chased me down the block. I was so tired from running that they eventually caught up to me and killed me. Much love❤️
attributes.title: No ❤️

attributes.review:

And I just don’t support trump, don’t like him ( I mean like who would. 🤦🏽‍♀️). He is not finna Ban Tik Tok no ma’am , people have worked to hard to get where they are now. Sooo with that being said tell the ✨ O R A N G E✨....
✨R A C I S T ✨.... 
✨ C H E E T O   P U F F ✨ mf to back off 🙃
attributes.title: ✨h o r r i b l e ✨

attributes.review: Not only did the app freeze my phone it also deleted all my data. I couldn't even restore my icloud and the only app on my phone other than the typical apple apps was the trump app. This is ridiculous. A scam. Worst app ever just like the worst president ever. He could even do this right!
attributes.title: Worst app ever

attributes.review: I followed in my fellow Cheeto supporters footsteps 🇱🇷🇱🇷🇱🇷🇱🇷🇱🇷and decided to download the app. I was so excited to learn all about the racist and homophobic ways of are supreme leader but right when I opened the app it showed the most OUTRAGEOUS picture imaginable! It was are lord and savior trump getting a TAN NUDE!!!!! HE IS LYING TO ALL OF US HE A FAKE CHEETO!!! 🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬LIKE I THOUGHT THAT HE WAS ONE OF OG DELICIOUS TASTING CHEETOS BUT HE TURNED OUT TO BE THE BAKED KIND LIKE THATS NOT EVEN A REAL CHEETO! 😡😡😡😡😡
attributes.title: WE ARE BEING LIED TO

attributes.review: THIS APP IS TERRIBLE every time i opened it, it shut down immediately, and with it my phone shut down. when i could finally get on it, all that was there were pictures of that hairy cheeto standing on the pedestal looking constipated. there was no place i could get my thoughts down or express my opinions on Tramp.
attributes.title: BAD BAD BAD BAD

attributes.review: As soon as the app downloaded it started making my phone glitch. When I tried to delete the app, the phone was saying that it was not possible. Also I’m pretty sure the app is against almost everything I believe.
attributes.title: I don’t recommend.

attributes.review: I can no longer support trump due to this awful app. Why must it take more than 5 hours to download. I have been fully let down. Not to mention the app is super slow and glitches. Sometimes it wont even open up. If this reflects how trump will treat us and the USA i don't wanna be apart of it 😡😡✨🧚‍♀️🧚‍♀️
